Stereotype.name: ChiStakeHolder
Stereotype.notes: Any person or force that have an interest in the considered domain.

Stereotype.name: ChiGoal
Stereotype.notes: a Measurable scope that the enterprise wants to achieve.

Tag.name: Priority
Tag.description: A priority in %

Tag.name: Value_Name
Tag.description: The name of the value this goal intends to alter

Tag.name: Value_ammount
Tag.description: The actual amount of the value this goal intends t

Tag.name: Value_Goal
Tag.description: The amount by which the value is to be altered

Stereotype.name: ChiRequirement
Stereotype.notes: A Business guide line about the Enterprise or the project.

Tag.description: A priority in %. Requirements are ordered by prior

Stereotype.name: ChiActionKey
Stereotype.notes: An action key used in Chronos. An action key associates two controllers (to define a control flow) or a view with a controller (to define a view attachment). Controller, Views and Associations define the application flow

Tag.name: action
Tag.description: The Action which triggeres this association

Tag.name: context
Tag.description: The Context in which this association is valid

Tag.name: config
Tag.description: The configuration file in which this association w

Stereotype.name: ChiBusinessProcess
Stereotype.notes: A Business Process is a sum of actions that produces a business advantage to the enterprise. It is composed by one or many ChiBusinessUseCases.

Stereotype.name: ChiBusinessUseCase
Stereotype.notes: A Business Use Case is part of a business process that produces an advantage to the enterprise.

Tag.name: PrimaryActor
Tag.description: the main actor of this use case

Tag.name: OtherActors
Tag.description: The list of actors associated with the use case. A

Tag.name: GoalInContext
Tag.description: The goal should implicitly express the actor's int

Tag.name: Scope
Tag.description: Boundaries in which the use case is operated when

Tag.name: Level
Tag.description: Authorizations for operations/actions to be perfor

Tag.name: Stakeholders
Tag.description: List of actors that have a special interest (i.e.

Tag.name: Precondition
Tag.description: A list of the conditions, if any, that must be met

Tag.name: Trigger
Tag.description: Event that is responsible for invocation of the us

Tag.name: MainSuccessScenario
Tag.description: The main path of logic an actor follows through a

Stereotype.name: ChiBusinessUseCaseCore
Stereotype.notes: A Core Use Case generates a value for an active business partner and is directly connected to the objectives (ChiGoals) of a company or the process of his existence (typically making money).

Stereotype.name: ChiManyToMany
Stereotype.notes: A many to many node used in WCMF. It is used to realize a many to many relation between wo WCMFNodes

Stereotype.name: ChiRelationEnd
Stereotype.notes: An association end used in WCMF

Tag.name: fk_name
Tag.description: The name of the foreign key column. The generator

Stereotype.name: ChiBusinessPartner
Stereotype.notes: A ChiBusinesPartner is an external person that has a Business relation with the enterprise.

Stereotype.name: ChiBusinessPartnerActive
Stereotype.notes: A ChiBusinesPartnerActive is a direct customer of the enterprise.

Stereotype.name: ChiBusinessPartnerPassive
Stereotype.notes: A ChiBusinesPartnerPassive is an indirect customer (typically a supplier) of the enterprise.

Stereotype.name: ChiWorker
Stereotype.notes: A ChiWorker is a special actor that works within the enterprise.

Stereotype.name: ChiWorkerExternal
Stereotype.notes: A Chi External Worker is an employee that interacts directly with ChiBusinesPartner outside the enterprise.

Stereotype.name: ChiWorkerInternal
Stereotype.notes: A Chi Worker Internal is an employee of the enterprise that has no contact with Business partners.

Stereotype.name: ChiNode
Stereotype.notes: A Node type used in WCMF. Nodes and Values define the application data model

Tag.description: The order of the associated parents.

Stereotype.name: ChiValueRef
Stereotype.notes: A Node value type used in WCMF. These values reference values of other Node types and are not persistent

Tag.name: reference_value
Tag.description: The referenced attribute

Stereotype.name: ChiValue
Stereotype.notes: A Node value type used in WCMF. These values are persistent

Tag.name: input_type
Tag.description: The HTML input type for the attribute e.g. select#

Tag.name: display_type
Tag.description: The HTML display type for the attribute e.g. image

Stereotype.name: ChiSystem
Stereotype.notes: A system configuration. Settings are modelled as attributes with default values

Tag.description: The plattform to which the configuration settings

Tag.name: config
Tag.description: The configuration file where the settings will be

Stereotype.name: ChiController
Stereotype.notes: A Controller type used in Chronos. Controller, Views and Associations define the application flow

Stereotype.name: ChiView
Stereotype.notes: A View used in WCMF. Controller, Views and Associations define the application flow
